column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of nominal compositions CuNi1–xVxO2 with x = 1/3, 1/2 and 2/3 were prepared by heating stoichiometric mixtures of Cu, CuO (Merck, 99.9%), NiO (Strem Chemicals, 99.99%) and V2O5 (Schüchardt München, 99.8%) in an evacuated silica tube.
#Text=Experimental conditions and reaction product compositions, determined by XRD analysis, are summarized in Table 1.
